overview: Keisha Grey was just minding her own business in the women's room of her school when local badgirls Bunny Freedom and LIzz Tayler came in to smoke and gossip.  After the events of school discipline part one, when principal Ariella Ferrera finds Keisha Grey lying on the women's room floor.  Tory Lane has been the lead singer for Tory Glory & The Snatches. Tory has an attitude problem with her potential replacement, Bonnie Rotten. Romi Rain was out shopping with her lesbian friends Breanne Benson and Summer Brielle, when those two busty sluts decided to show her what she was missing by being with dudes. Kiara Mia wants to try out anal with her husband, but her tight little asshole has never even had a finger in there and she's too scared to let her husband's cock up her ass without a little practice!
title: Hot and Mean 14
